title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 94.2 - Prohibited acts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 94.2 - Prohibited acts

State Regulations
(a) No person
shall use a mechanically propelled boat or canoe in the area unless it utilizes
an electric motor. (b) No person
shall moor or beach overnight any boat or canoe. (c) No person shall swim in the
area. (d) No person shall camp in
the area. (e) No person shall
litter in the area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
94.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
